question.text: Determine the correct statement from the given option with respect to an electrostatic precipitator.

options.text: the velocity of air is very fast so that a large volume of air can be purified at a time.
the electrode wires maintained at several thousand volts produces a corona which releases positively charged particles.
air is passed through a spray of water and lime.
collecting plates are grounded and collect negatively charged dust particles.

solution.text: Electrostatic precipitator has electrodes maintained at many thousand volts. They produce a corona that releases negatively charged electrons which combine with dust particles to give them a negative charge. Grounded collecting plates collect these negatively charged dust particles if the air velocity is low allowing the dust to fall.
